Secondary call-to-action button with outline style and hover fill effect

- Hover state: Fills with blue background and white text
- Enhanced styling: Shadow effects (shadow-lg, hover:shadow-xl)

- Link styling: No underline decoration

calculator-buttons-grid.contentMarkdown:
**Quick Calculator Navigation Bar Design**

Compact horizontal button layout with single-line display approach

- Theme color: Blue gradient scheme (bg-blue-600, hover:bg-blue-700)
- Font: Extra small text (text-xs) for compact display
- Border radius style: Standard button radius with small padding (px-2 py-1)
- Layout: Flex container with horizontal scroll on overflow
- Spacing: Minimal gap (gap-1) between buttons
- Responsive: Full text on desktop (md:inline), abbreviated on mobile
- Icons: Small 12x12px icons (h-3 w-3) for compact appearance
- Scroll behavior: Hidden scrollbar with smooth horizontal scrolling

sitemap-route-element.contentMarkdown:
**Sitemap XML Generator**
- XML Declaration: Required, UTF-8 encoding
- URL Set Container: Required, proper namespace
- Homepage URL: Required, priority 1.0, weekly updates
- Calculator URLs: Required, priority 0.9, monthly updates  
- Static Page URLs: Required, variable priority, monthly/yearly updates
- Dynamic Date: Required, auto-generated current date
- Proper XML Structure: Required, valid sitemap format

sitemap-xml-display.contentMarkdown:
**XML Sitemap Display**
- XML declaration header
- URL entries for all site pages with metadata
- Monospace font formatting for readability
- Clean white background display

sitemap-xml-route.contentMarkdown:
**Sitemap XML Generator Route**

- XML Document Structure: Required, UTF-8 encoding with proper XML declaration
- URL Set Container: Required, sitemap namespace specification
- Homepage Entry: Required, priority 1.0, weekly change frequency
- Calculator Page Entries: Required, priority 0.9, monthly updates
- Static Page Entries: Required, varying priority levels, appropriate frequencies
- Dynamic Date Generation: Required, current date for lastmod field
- Document Replacement: Required, replace entire HTML document with XML
- Content Type Meta: Required, application/xml charset specification

temp-clear-button.contentMarkdown:
**Clear Temperature Button**
When clicked:
- Clears temperature input field
- Clears result display
- Logs clearing action to console

temp-convert-button.contentMarkdown:
**Convert Temperature Button**
When clicked:
- Validates temperature input is a valid number
- Converts input from source unit to Celsius first
- Converts from Celsius to target unit
- Displays formatted result with unit symbol
- Shows conversion summary
- Logs conversion process to console

temp-converter-page.contentMarkdown:
**Temperature Converter Page**
- Header with CalcSuites navigation
- Hero section with thermometer icon and title
- Temperature converter calculator card with:
  - Temperature input field
  - From unit selector (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, Rankine)
  - To unit selector (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, Rankine)
  - Convert and Clear buttons
  - Results display with conversion summary
- Educational information cards:
  - Conversion formulas reference
  - Common temperature references
- Back to calculators navigation
- Footer with contact information
